Everyone wants to look good and have a spectacular figure, but they don't always have enough time to work out in the gym. A properly selected set of physical exercises for home is a great alternative to going to the gym. If you develop a competent training program and purchase a few simple sports equipment, classes at home will be very effective.

Thanks to regular workouts, you can tighten your figure and get rid of extra pounds even outside the gym. Home workouts are a time and money saver. 
	 With a well-chosen program, even those who are just starting to join fitness can train at home. 
	 The complex of exercises for training at home provides a load on all muscle groups. 
	 Bulky expensive sports equipment and simulators are not required.
General rules before starting a workout

Don't ignore the warm-up (warming up the muscles before training) and the hitch (stretching the whole body after training). Despite the lack of time, pay enough attention to the initial and final stage. 
	To reduce injury, practice in sneakers. 
	Exclude physical activity within an hour after eating. 
	Training for beginners should last no more than 20-25 minutes. 
	To perform some exercises, you may need sports equipment (dumbbells, horizontal bars, expander, etc.). 
	wHen drawing up a training scheme, the set of exercises should be divided into 3-4 classes per week. Days of intensive and light training should be alternated.
